title: 6-gallon bucket with spigot
description: Vessel for fermenting and mixing beer

title: 5-gallon glass carboy
description: Vessel for fermenting beer during late stages

title: Strainer or muslin bag
description: Used to hold grains or hops

description: Used to prevent oxygen from entering the fermenter

title: Hydrometer
description: Used to measure the "gravity" of beer (might not come with all kits)
